message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but a 55/45 split seems fairer in the long run. Let's not risk losing money to inflation.
I see your point about fairness, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Meeting you halfway between our offers.
Alice, let's be practical. We're losing money with every round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Don't let greed make us lose everything.
